relations.target: pony: any of various breeds of small gentle horses usually less than five feet high at the shoulder <i48108>
brother: a close friend who accompanies his buddies in their activities <i88718>
man: an adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman); 'there were two women and six men on the bus' <i91182>
fan: an ardent follower and admirer <i89881>

senses.definition: an adult, male fan of the show My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic
